snippet: The street sign said, “No standing April to October.” On Oct. 2, it sure would be handy if “to” meant until October, not through October. What’s a driver to do?
abstract: The street sign said, “No standing April to October.” On Oct. 2, it sure would be handy if “to” meant until October, not through October. What’s a driver to do?

headline.main: Behind the Steering Wheel and Not a Grammarian in Sight
headline.print_headline: Behind the Wheel, and Not a Grammarian in Sight
